quotes.quote: "If you close down the way to your own path, it will always open up. That's why this isn't a song of ending. It is a new encounter. A song of beginning."
It's harder to fool one's self than to fool others.
If you close down the way to your own path, it will always open up. That's why this isn't a song of ending. It is a new encounter. A song of beginning.
